messages.message: Hi @Monette. I analyzed this pdf. The pdf has text as part of the image and then there's an invisible layer of text on top of the image which is why translated image shows old text as well. Was this original pdf generated by us? It's very similar to how we generate machine readable pdfs.
Hi @Gaurav Saini this was a PDF shared with us by our third party compliance consultant in Germany.
Possibly itâ€™s the way they are scanning in the document?

Yeah, could be the case. But, in such cases there's no way to prevent the overlap since text is part of the image. The only way would be to create an entirely new pdf but then it wouldn't look like the original pdf or have any of its formatting.
Gotcha, okie so in this scenario when that happens I will continue to create my word doc to capture the translation. Thank you for looking into this
